A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a huge disappointment in this series. There are so many plot holes and this very much suffers from Lost syndrome where all the questions raised in Force Awakened are either not answered\, or poorly answered. 

This movie absolutely destroys Luke's legacy. Just a disgrace. The plot is all over the place and the humor is extraordinarily corny. I had high expectations when I saw the critic reviews\, but they obviously wearing rose colored glasses when it comes to this franchise. 

Some great visual effects\, but that's it...
